title: Thad Reynolds // 39
description:
One early morning in July 2004, a 36-year-old Georgia man is killed shortly after his arrival at work. As a beloved member of the community and passionate Deacon at his local church, who would want him dead- and why? This is the murder of Thad Reynolds.





Get 10% off your Vampire Wine order at vampire.com using promo code GOINGWEST at checkout! These incredible wines are perfect for a Halloween party or just a Fall night in.

http://www.northwestgeorgianews.com/rome/news/reynolds-harper-both-heading-to-prison/article_f33e65aa-f94b-5ed8-9b6c-d9ae3ae6f5cd.html

https://murderpedia.org/female.R/r/reynolds-michelle.htm

https://www.parnickjenningsfuneral.com/memorials/Reynolds-Thad/1279286/obituary.php
